name: Zoobles
description:
Immerse yourself in the wonderful world of Zoobles! Adopt a loveable Zooble companion and watch it spring to life before your eyes!

Features

• 18 adorable Zoobles to choose from, which one will be your new best friend?
• Explore 6 whimsical worlds while meeting over 40 new Zooble friends!
• Earn Zoints to unlock over 120 décor and accessory items to embellish your Happitat!
